experiences.name: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
- Led full-stack development of a Single Sign-On (SSO) and Human Capital Management Information System (HCMIS) web application, collaborating with Project Managers and UI/UX designers.
- Improved product quality and user experience by partnering with Quality Assurance to identify, troubleshoot, and resolve critical bugs and performance issues.
- Developed interactive and responsive web interfaces from UI/UX designs, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and optimal user engagement.
- Integrated front-end applications with RESTful APIs, optimizing data flow and ensuring robust client-server communication.
- Optimized data access and system performance through caching strategies, reducing database load and improving API response times
- Managed and optimized SQL databases, including schema design, query optimization, and data migration, to ensure data integrity and support high-volume transactional workloads.
- Participated in peer code reviews and Pull Request (PR) approvals, providing constructive feedback to maintain high code quality.

experiences.name: Frontend Web Developer Intern
experiences.description:
- Worked with UI/UX & backend to develop Single Sign-On app and SaaS products.
- Implement front-end apps with REST API

experiences.name: Full Stack Engineer Apprenticeship
experiences.description:
- Developed REST API for laundry management using Go.
- Developed a musician freelancing portal front-end using ReactJS.
- Developed REST API & front-end for gym membership system using Go as back-end & ReactJS as front-end

experiences.name: Practicum Assistant: Programming Algorithm

- Provide tutors to students regarding Programming Algorithm course.

experiences.name: Programming Algorithm Tutor
